patthana8.22:1.1_0: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:1.1_1: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:1.1_2: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.22:2.1_0: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:2.1_1: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.22:2.1_2: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.22:3.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ
patthana8.22:3.1_2: paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca
patthana8.22:3.1_3: nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.22:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
